meanings.definition: A milky fluid found in certain plants, such as rubber trees, used in making rubber products.
meanings.sent1: The latex from rubber trees is used to make rubber gloves.
meanings.sent2: I bought a mattress made of latex for my bed.
meanings.sent3: The rubber tree was upset when its latex was turned into a balloon.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed like the latex from a rubber tree.
meanings.sent5: The milky latex oozed out of the rubber tree, ready to be transformed into useful products.

meanings.definition: A synthetic material made from polymers derived from latex fluids, used in making various products such as gloves and balloons.
meanings.sent1: Latex is a common material used for making balloons.
meanings.sent2: The gloves were made of a durable latex material.
meanings.sent3: The balloon animal artist only used latex to create his masterpieces.
meanings.sent4: Her love for crafting with latex knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The latex material was so versatile, it could be molded into any shape imaginable.
